info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 11 at 3:03PM MDT until July 11 at 3:30PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ROOSEVELT AND NORTHEASTERN RICHLAND COUNTIES... At 302 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Froid, or 8 miles north of Culbertson, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Culbertson, Bainville, Froid, Mccabe and Fort Kipp. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
